name: Sonic Neo Harmony
description:
Sonic Neo Harmony is a project dedicated to combining elements from different Sonic games throughout history to create a compact, mobile-friendly experience.  The game focuses heavily optimization, so it has the potential to run even on older devices!

Sonic Neo Harmony combines elements from Sonic Jam, Sonic Pocket Adventure, and Sonic Unleashed, as well as other games outside the franchise like Touhou or Jak and Daxter.   I hope you can enjoy all these different elements harmonizing with each other!

Official SNH Tumblr! https://sonicneoharmony.tumblr.com/
